QuestData.Title: An Airtight Alibi
QuestData.Description:
It'll take us a while to clean up the beasts that are left over, but I'm confident we'll be able to take back Fletcher's Hollow--thanks to you, of course.
Here, take this letter to the constable. It should be enough to clear Miss Waycrest's name.
I'm sorry you had to witness all of this, mainlander. We are good people, but these are terrible times.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Evelyn Pare's letter to Constable Henry Framer at Hangman's Point.
QuestData.RewardText:
What's this? A letter from Mayor Pare?
<Constable Framer reads Evelyn's letter.>
Well... it appears we were... mistaken.
